title: A pleasant comedie, called Summers last will and testament. Written by Thomas Nash
author: Nash, Thomas, 1567-1601.
publisher: By Simon Stafford, for Walter Burre,
notes: Running title reads: Summers last will and testament.
Sheet F is missigned D; first leaf has the "D" erased and "F" stamped in. Variant 2: this correction not made.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
